tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE StoreEnergyConsumption (
	store_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	store_name VARCHAR(255),
	year INT,
	month INT,
	daily_energy_consumption DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE store_energy_consumption (
    store_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    consumption_date DATE,
    kWh_consumed DECIMAL,
    efficiency_rating DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
  store_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  month INT NOT NULL,
  year INT NOT NULL,
  energy_usage DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_store FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES stores(store_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT NOT NULL,
    year INT NOT NULL,
    month INT NOT NULL,
    consumption_kwh FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES Store(store_id)
);

CREATE TABLE StoreArea (
    area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT NOT NULL,
    area_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    area_size FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES Store(store_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EfficiencyImprovements (
    improvement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT NOT NULL,
    improvement_desc TEXT NOT NULL,
    improvement_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES Store(store_id)
);

CREATE TABLE StoreEmployees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT NOT NULL,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    job_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    hire_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES Store(store_id)
);
